chinese: 大学图书馆有大部分必要的书籍。
english: The university library has most of the necessary books.

chinese: 包装对吸引买家的注意很重要。
english: Packaging is very important to attract the attention of a buyer.

chinese: 医学研究人员专注于不同的治疗和疾病。
english: Medical researchers have focused on the different treatments and diseases.

chinese: 计算机的一个非常基本的特征是计数和计算。
english: A very basic feature of computing is counting and calculating.

chinese: 每日练习可以建立信心并提高技能。
english: Daily practice can build confidence and improve skills.

chinese: 课程之间的关键区别是评估的类型。
english: The key difference between courses is the kind of assessment.

chinese: 校园导览将帮助您熟悉教学设施。
english: The campus tour will help you to get familiar with the teaching facilities.

chinese: 同伴群体的压力对年轻人有显著影响。
english: Peer group pressure has a significant effect on young people.

chinese: 倾听是在这门课程中取得成功的关键技能。
english: Listening is the key skill to succeed in this course.

chinese: 你需要在下个学期交论文。
english: You need to hand in the essay next semester.
